00071 static const USBTIMER_Callback_TypeDef hcTimeoutFunc[ MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS ]=
00072 {

00078 static void Timeout( int hcnum )
00079 {
00080   uint32_t hcchar;
00081   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00082   USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00083 
00084 #if defined( __GNUC__ )
00085 #pragma GCC diagnostic push
00086 #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Warray-bounds"
00087 #endif
00088 
00089   hc = &hcs[ hcnum ];
00090 
00091 #if defined( __GNUC__ )
00092 #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
00093 #endif
00094 
00095   hcchar = USBHHAL_GetHcChar( hcnum );
00096   ep = hc->ep;
00097 
00098   if ( ep->type != USB_EPTYPE_INTR )
00099   {
00100     USBHHAL_HCHalt( hcnum, hcchar );
00101     hc->status |= HCS_TIMEOUT;
00102     ep->timeout = 0;
00103     if ( !hc->idle )
00104       USBHEP_TransferDone( hc->ep, USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT );
00105   }
00106   else
00107   {
00108     if ( !ep->timeout )
00109     {
00110       /* Restart the channel */
00111       USBHHAL_HCStart( hcnum );
00112       USBTIMER_Start( hcnum + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
00113                       ep->epDesc.bInterval, hcTimeoutFunc[ hcnum ] );
00114     }
00115     else
00116     {
00117       ep->timeout -= EFM32_MIN( ep->timeout, ep->epDesc.bInterval );
00118       if ( ep->timeout )
00119       {
00120         /* Restart the channel */
00121         USBHHAL_HCStart( hcnum );
00122         USBTIMER_Start( hcnum + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
00123                         EFM32_MIN( ep->timeout, ep->epDesc.bInterval ),
00124                         hcTimeoutFunc[ hcnum ] );
00125       }
00126       else
00127       {
00128         USBHHAL_HCHalt( hcnum, hcchar );
00129         hc->status |= HCS_TIMEOUT;
00130         if ( !hc->idle )
00131           USBHEP_TransferDone( hc->ep, USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT );
00132       }
00133     }
00134   }
00135 }

00139 /***************************************************************************/
00160 int USBH_AssignHostChannel( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, uint8_t hcnum )
00161 {
00162   ep->type        = ep->epDesc.bmAttributes & CONFIG_DESC_BM_TRANSFERTYPE;
00163   ep->in          = ( ep->epDesc.bEndpointAddress & USB_SETUP_DIR_MASK ) != 0;
00164   ep->packetSize  = ep->epDesc.wMaxPacketSize;
00165   ep->addr        = ep->epDesc.bEndpointAddress;
00166   ep->state       = H_EP_IDLE;
00167 
00168   if ( ep == NULL )
00169   {
00170     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_AssignHostChannel(),"
00171                         " ep NULL pointer" );
00172     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00173     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00174   }
00175 
00176   if ( hcnum >= MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS )
00177   {
00178     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_AssignHostChannel(),"
00179                         " Illegal host channel number" );
00180     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00181     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00182   }
00183 
00184   if ( ep->in )
00185   {
00186     ep->hcIn  = hcnum;
00187   }
00188   else
00189   {
00190     ep->hcOut = hcnum;
00191   }
00192 
00193   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00194 }

00196 /***************************************************************************/
00246 int USBH_ControlMsg( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep,
00247                      uint8_t bmRequestType,
00248                      uint8_t bRequest,
00249                      uint16_t wValue,
00250                      uint16_t wIndex,
00251                      uint16_t wLength,
00252                      void *data,
00253                      int timeout,
00254                      USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback )
00255 {
00256   if ( ep == NULL )
00257   {
00258     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), ep NULL pointer" );
00259     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00260     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00261   }
00262 
00263   if ( !USBH_DeviceConnected() )
00264   {
00265     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), No device connected" );
00266     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00267   }
00268 
00269   if ( (uint32_t)data & 3 )
00270   {
00271     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), Misaligned data buffer" );
00272     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00273     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00274   }
00275 
00276   INT_Disable();
00277   if ( ep->state != H_EP_IDLE )
00278   {
00279     INT_Enable();
00280     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), Endpoint is busy" );
00281     return USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY;
00282   }
00283 
00284   if ( !hcs[ ep->hcIn ].idle || !hcs[ ep->hcOut ].idle )
00285   {
00286     INT_Enable();
00287     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), Host channel is busy" );
00288     return USB_STATUS_HC_BUSY;
00289   }
00290 
00291   ep->setup.bmRequestType = bmRequestType;
00292   ep->setup.bRequest      = bRequest;
00293   ep->setup.wValue        = wValue;
00294   ep->setup.wIndex        = wIndex;
00295   ep->setup.wLength       = wLength;
00296 
00297   ep->xferCompleted  = false;
00298   ep->state          = H_EP_SETUP;
00299   ep->xferCompleteCb = callback;
00300   ep->buf            = data;
00301   ep->xferred        = 0;
00302   ep->timeout        = timeout;
00303   ep->setupErrCnt    = 0;
00304 
00305   if ( timeout )
00306   {
00307     USBTIMER_Start( ep->hcOut + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
00308                     timeout, hcTimeoutFunc[ ep->hcOut ] );
00309   }
00310 
00311   USBH_CtlSendSetup( ep );
00312 
00313   INT_Enable();
00314 
00315   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00316 }

00318 /***************************************************************************/
00367 int USBH_ControlMsgB( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep,
00368                       uint8_t bmRequestType,
00369                       uint8_t bRequest,
00370                       uint16_t wValue,
00371                       uint16_t wIndex,
00372                       uint16_t wLength,
00373                       void *data,
00374                       int timeout )
00375 {
00376   int retVal;
00377 
00378   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
00379   {
00380     INT_Enable();
00381     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsgB() called with int's disabled" );
00382     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00383     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00384   }
00385 
00386   retVal = USBH_ControlMsg( ep,
00387                             bmRequestType,
00388                             bRequest,
00389                             wValue,
00390                             wIndex,
00391                             wLength,
00392                             data,
00393                             timeout,
00394                             NULL );
00395   INT_Enable();
00396 
00397   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
00398   {
00399     while ( ! ep->xferCompleted );
00400 
00401     if ( ( retVal = ep->xferStatus ) == USB_STATUS_OK )
00402     {
00403       retVal = ep->xferred;
00404     }
00405   }
00406 
00407   return retVal;
00408 }

00412 USB_Status_TypeDef USBH_CtlReceiveData( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, uint16_t length )
00413 {
00414   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00415 
00416   ep->in = true;
00417   ep->toggle = USB_PID_DATA1;
00418   ep->remaining = length;
00419 
00420   hc = &hcs[ ep->hcIn ];
00421   hc->buf = ep->buf;
00422   hc->xferred = 0;
00423   hc->remaining = length;
00424 
00425   USBHHAL_HCStart( ep->hcIn );
00426 
00427   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00428 }

00430 #if defined( USB_RAW_API )
00431 int USBH_CtlRxRaw( uint8_t pid, USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount )
00432 {
00433   uint16_t  packets, len;
00434   int       hcnum, retval;
00435   uint32_t  hcchar, status;
00436 
00437   hcnum = ep->hcIn;
00438   if ( byteCount > 0 )
00439     packets = ( byteCount + ep->packetSize - 1 ) / ep->packetSize;
00440   else
00441     packets = 1;
00442   len = packets * ep->packetSize;
00443 
00444   INT_Disable();
00445 
00446   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = USB_HC_INT_STALL | USB_HC_INT_NAK | USB_HC_INT_ACK;
00447   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;      /* Clear all interrupt flags      */
00448   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00449   USB->HAINTMSK |= 1 << hcnum;            /* Enable host channel interrupt  */
00450   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR =                 /* Program HCCHAR register        */
00451       ( ep->parentDevice->addr     <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_DEVADDR_SHIFT     ) |
00452       ( ( ep->addr & USB_EPNUM_MASK ) << _USB_HC_CHAR_EPNUM_SHIFT      ) |
00453       ( ep->type                   <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_EPTYPE_SHIFT      ) |
00454       ( ep->packetSize             <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_MPS_SHIFT         ) |
00455       ( USB_HC_CHAR_EPDIR                                              ) |
00456       ( ep->parentDevice->speed ==
00457                            HPRT_L_SPEED >> _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_SHIFT
00458                                     ?   USB_HC_CHAR_LSPDDEV       : 0  );
00459   USB->HC[ hcnum ].TSIZ =
00460           ( ( len     << _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT ) &
00461                          _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK       ) |
00462           ( ( packets << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT   ) &
00463                          _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_MASK         ) |
00464           ( ( pid     << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_SHIFT      ) &
00465                          _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_MASK            );
00466   USB->HC[ hcnum ].DMAADDR = (uint32_t)data;
00467   hcchar = ( USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR & ~USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS ) | USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA;
00468   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00469 
00470   /* Start polling for interrupt */
00471   retval = USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR;
00472   while ( ( USBHAL_GetCoreInts() & USB_GINTSTS_HCHINT ) == 0 ){}
00473   if ( USBHHAL_GetHostChannelInts() & ( 1 << hcnum ) )
00474   {
00475     status = USBHHAL_GetHcInts( hcnum );
00476     hcchar |= USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS;
00477     USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00478     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = 0;
00479     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00480 
00481     if ( status & USB_HC_INT_STALL )
00482       retval = USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED;
00483     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_NAK )
00484       retval = USB_STATUS_EP_NAK;
00485     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_ACK )
00486       retval = USB_STATUS_OK;
00487   }
00488 
00489   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00490   INT_Enable();
00491 
00492   return retval;
00493 }
00494 #endif

00496 USB_Status_TypeDef USBH_CtlSendData( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, uint16_t length )
00497 {
00498   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00499 
00500   ep->in = false;
00501   ep->toggle = USB_PID_DATA1;
00502   ep->remaining = length;
00503 
00504   hc = &hcs[ ep->hcOut ];
00505   hc->buf = ep->buf;
00506   hc->xferred = 0;

00513 
00514 USB_Status_TypeDef USBH_CtlSendSetup( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00515 {
00516   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00517 
00518   hc = &hcs[ ep->hcOut ];
00519   hc->buf = (uint8_t*)&ep->setup;
00520   hc->xferred = 0;
00521   hc->remaining = USB_SETUP_PKT_SIZE;
00522   hc->ep = ep;
00523   hcs[ ep->hcIn ].ep = ep;
00524 
00525   ep->toggle = USB_PID_SETUP;
00526   ep->remaining = USB_SETUP_PKT_SIZE;
00527 
00528   ep->in = true;
00529   USBHHAL_HCInit( ep->hcIn );
00530 
00531   ep->in = false;
00532   USBHHAL_HCInit( ep->hcOut );
00533 
00534   USBHHAL_HCStart( ep->hcOut );
00535 
00536   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00537 }

00539 #if defined( USB_RAW_API )
00540 int USBH_CtlTxRaw( uint8_t pid, USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount )
00541 {
00542   uint16_t  packets;
00543   int       hcnum, retval;
00544   uint32_t  hcchar, status;
00545 
00546   hcnum = ep->hcOut;
00547   if ( byteCount > 0 )
00548     packets = ( byteCount + ep->packetSize - 1 ) / ep->packetSize;
00549   else
00550     packets = 1;
00551 
00552   INT_Disable();
00553 
00554   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = USB_HC_INT_STALL | USB_HC_INT_NAK | USB_HC_INT_ACK;
00555   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;      /* Clear all interrupt flags      */
00556   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00557   USB->HAINTMSK |= 1 << hcnum;            /* Enable host channel interrupt  */
00558   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR =                 /* Program HCCHAR register        */
00559       ( ep->parentDevice->addr     <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_DEVADDR_SHIFT     ) |
00560       ( ( ep->addr & USB_EPNUM_MASK ) << _USB_HC_CHAR_EPNUM_SHIFT      ) |
00561       ( ep->type                   <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_EPTYPE_SHIFT      ) |
00562       ( ep->packetSize             <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_MPS_SHIFT         ) |
00563       ( ep->parentDevice->speed ==
00564                            HPRT_L_SPEED >> _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_SHIFT
00565                                     ?   USB_HC_CHAR_LSPDDEV       : 0  );
00566   USB->HC[ hcnum ].TSIZ =
00567           ( ( byteCount << _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT ) &
00568                            _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK       ) |
00569           ( ( packets   << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT   ) &
00570                            _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_MASK         ) |
00571           ( ( pid       << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_SHIFT      ) &
00572                            _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_MASK            );
00573   USB->HC[ hcnum ].DMAADDR = (uint32_t)data;
00574   hcchar = ( USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR & ~USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS ) | USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA;
00575   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00576 
00577   /* Start polling for interrupt */
00578   retval = USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR;
00579   while ( ( USBHAL_GetCoreInts() & USB_GINTSTS_HCHINT ) == 0 ){}
00580   if ( USBHHAL_GetHostChannelInts() & ( 1 << hcnum ) )
00581   {
00582     status = USBHHAL_GetHcInts( hcnum );
00583     hcchar |= USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS;
00584     USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00585     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = 0;
00586     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00587 
00588     if ( status & USB_HC_INT_STALL )
00589       retval = USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED;
00590     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_NAK )
00591       retval = USB_STATUS_EP_NAK;
00592     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_ACK )
00593       retval = USB_STATUS_OK;
00594   }
00595 
00596   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00597   INT_Enable();
00598 
00599   return retval;
00600 }

00647 int USBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device,
00648                                       void *buf, int len,
00649                                       uint8_t configIndex )
00650 {
00651   if ( device == NULL )
00652   {
00653     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB(),"
00654                         " device NULL pointer" );
00655     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00656     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00657   }
00658 
00659   if ( buf == NULL )
00660   {
00661     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB(),"
00662                         " buf NULL pointer" );
00663     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00664     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00665   }
00666 
00667   return USBH_ControlMsgB( &device->ep0,
00668                     USB_SETUP_DIR_D2H | USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE |
00669                     USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK,         /* bmRequestType */
00670                     GET_DESCRIPTOR,                       /* bRequest      */
00671                     (USB_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR << 8) | configIndex,/* wValue   */
00672                     0,                                    /* wIndex        */
00673                     len,                                  /* wLength       */
00674                     buf,                                  /* void* data    */
00675                     DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT );               /* int timeout   */
00676 }

00746 /***************************************************************************/
00779 int USBH_GetStringB( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device, uint8_t *buf, int bufLen,
00780                      uint8_t stringIndex, uint16_t langID )
00781 {
00782   int retVal;
00783   USB_StringDescriptor_TypeDef* sd;
00784 
00785   if ( device == NULL )
00786   {
00787     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_GetStringB(), device NULL pointer" );
00788     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00789     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00790   }
00791 
00792   if ( buf == NULL )
00793   {
00794     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_GetStringB(), buf NULL pointer" );
00795     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00796     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00797   }
00798 
00799   retVal = USBH_ControlMsgB(
00800                     &device->ep0,
00801                     USB_SETUP_DIR_D2H | USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE |
00802                     USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK,         /* bmRequestType */
00803                     GET_DESCRIPTOR,                       /* bRequest      */
00804                     (USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR << 8) | stringIndex,/* wValue   */
00805                     langID,                               /* wIndex        */
00806                     EFM32_MIN( bufLen, 255 ),             /* wLength       */
00807                     buf,                                  /* void* data    */
00808                     DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT );               /* int timeout   */
00809 
00810   if ( retVal > 2 )
00811   {
00812     sd = (USB_StringDescriptor_TypeDef*)buf;
00813     if ( sd->len )
00814     {
00815       sd->name[ (sd->len - 2) / sizeof( char16_t ) ] = '\0';
00816     }
00817   }
00818   return retVal;
00819 }

00821 /***************************************************************************/
00837 int USBH_Init( const USBH_Init_TypeDef *p )
00838 {
00839   if ( p == NULL )
00840   {
00841     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Init(), init struct NULL pointer" );
00842     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00843     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00844   }
00845 
00846   if ( (    p->rxFifoSize   < MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INBYTES )
00847        || ( p->nptxFifoSize < MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INBYTES )
00848        || ( p->ptxFifoSize  < MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INBYTES )
00849        || ( (p->rxFifoSize + p->nptxFifoSize + p->ptxFifoSize) >
00850             (MAX_HOST_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS * 4) ) )
00851   {
00852     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Init(), Illegal Tx/Rx FIFO memory configuration" );
00853     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00854     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00855   }
00856   USBH_initData = *p;
00857 
00858   CMU_ClockSelectSet( cmuClock_HF, cmuSelect_HFXO );
00859   USBTIMER_Init();
00860   USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
00861 
00862   /* Enable USB clock. */
00863   INT_Disable();
00864   CMU->CMD = CMU_CMD_USBCCLKSEL_HFCLKNODIV;
00865   CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 |= CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USB | CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USBC;
00866   INT_Enable();
00867 
00868   /* Enable USB interrupt. */
00869   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00870   NVIC_EnableIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00871 
00872   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00873 }
00874 
00875 /***************************************************************************/
00905 int USBH_InitDeviceData( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device,
00906                          const uint8_t *buf,
00907                          USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep,
00908                          int numEp,
00909                          uint8_t deviceSpeed )
00910 {
00911   int i;
00912 
00913   if ( device == NULL )
00914   {
00915     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_InitDeviceData(), device NULL pointer" );
00916     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00917     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00918   }
00919 
00920   memset( device, 0, sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ) );
00921 
00922   device->ep = ep;
00923   device->addr = 0;
00924   device->numEp = numEp;
00925   device->speed = deviceSpeed;
00926 
00927   device->ep0.packetSize = 8;
00928   if ( buf )      /* Copy EP0 data from buffer filled by USBH_QueryDevice() */
00929   {
00930     memcpy( &device->ep0,
00931             &((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->ep0, sizeof( USBH_Ep_TypeDef ) );
00932   }
00933   device->ep0.parentDevice = device;
00934   device->ep0.type = USB_EPTYPE_CTRL;
00935   device->ep0.hcOut = 0;
00936   device->ep0.hcIn = 1;
00937 
00938   if ( ep )
00939   {
00940     for ( i=0; i<numEp; i++ )
00941     {
00942       memset( &device->ep[i], 0, sizeof( USBH_Ep_TypeDef ) );
00943       device->ep[i].parentDevice = device;
00944       device->ep[i].toggle = USB_PID_DATA0;
00945     }
00946   }
00947 
00948   if ( buf )/* Copy descriptor data from buffer filled by USBH_QueryDevice() */
00949   {
00950     memcpy( &device->devDesc,
00951             &((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->devDesc, USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE );
00952     memcpy( &device->confDesc,
00953             &((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->confDesc, USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE );
00954     memcpy( &device->itfDesc,
00955             USBH_QGetInterfaceDescriptor( buf, 0, 0 ), USB_INTERFACE_DESCSIZE );
00956 
00957     if ( ep )
00958     {
00959       for ( i=0; i<numEp; i++ )
00960       {
00961         memcpy( &device->ep[i].epDesc,
00962                 USBH_QGetEndpointDescriptor( buf, 0, 0, i ),
00963                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCSIZE );
00964       }
00965     }
00966   }
00967 
00968   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00969 }
00970 
00971 /***************************************************************************/
00982 int USBH_PortReset( void )
00983 {
00984   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
00985   {
00986     INT_Enable();
00987     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_PortReset() called with int's disabled" );
00988     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00989     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00990   }
00991 
00992   USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_CONNECTED_RESETTING;
00993   USBHHAL_PortReset( true );
00994   INT_Enable();
00995   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 30 );                 /* USB Reset delay */
00996   INT_Disable();
00997   USBHHAL_PortReset( false );
00998   INT_Enable();
00999   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 10 );                 /* Reset recovery time */
01000   USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
01001 
01002   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01003 }
01004 
01005 /***************************************************************************/
01012 int USBH_PortResume( void )
01013 {
01014   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
01015   {
01016     INT_Enable();
01017     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_PortResume() called with int's disabled" );
01018     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01019     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01020   }
01021 
01022   USBHHAL_PortResume( true );
01023   INT_Enable();
01024   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 30 );
01025   INT_Disable();
01026   USBHHAL_PortResume( false );
01027   INT_Enable();
01028 
01029   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01030 }
01031 
01032 /***************************************************************************/
01036 void USBH_PortSuspend( void )
01037 {
01038   INT_Disable();
01039   USBHHAL_PortSuspend();
01040   INT_Enable();
01041 }
01042 
01045 int USBH_PortVbusOn( bool on )
01046 {
01047   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
01048   {
01049     INT_Enable();
01050     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_PortVbusOn() called with int's disabled" );
01051     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01052     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01053   }
01054 
01055   USBHHAL_VbusOn( on );
01056 
01057   if ( !on )
01058     USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
01059 
01060   INT_Enable();
01061   USBTIMER_DelayMs( PORT_VBUS_DELAY );
01062 
01063   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01064 }

01068 #if defined( USB_USE_PRINTF )
01069 /***************************************************************************/
01085 int USBH_PrintConfigurationDescriptor(
01086                             const USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef *config,
01087                             int maxLen )
01088 {
01089   char *c;
01090   int remaining;
01091 
01092   if ( config == NULL )
01093   {
01094     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_PrintConfigurationDescriptor(),"
01095                         " config NULL pointer" );
01096     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01097     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01098   }
01099 
01100   USB_PRINTF( "\n\nConfiguration descriptor:" );
01101   USB_PRINTF( "\n bLength              %d",     config->bLength             );
01102   USB_PRINTF( "\n bDescriptorType      0x%02X", config->bDescriptorType     );
01103   USB_PRINTF( "\n wTotalLength         %d",     config->wTotalLength        );
01104   USB_PRINTF( "\n bNumInterfaces       %d",     config->bNumInterfaces      );
01105   USB_PRINTF( "\n bConfigurationValue  %d",     config->bConfigurationValue );
01106   USB_PRINTF( "\n iConfiguration       %d",     config->iConfiguration      );
01107   USB_PRINTF( "\n bmAttributes         0x%02X", config->bmAttributes        );
01108   USB_PRINTF( "\n bMaxPower            %d\n",   config->bMaxPower           );
01109 
01110   maxLen -= config->bLength;
01111   if ( maxLen > 0 )
01112   {
01113     remaining = EFM32_MIN( config->wTotalLength - config->bLength, maxLen );
01114     if ( remaining > 0 )
01115     {
01116       USB_PUTCHAR( '\n' );
01117       c = (char*)(config + 1);
01118       while ( remaining-- )
01119       {
01120         USB_PRINTF( "0x%02X ", *c++ );
01121       }
01122       USB_PUTCHAR( '\n' );
01123     }
01124   }
01125 
01126   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01127 }

01244 
01245 #if defined( __ICCARM__ )
01246 #pragma diag_suppress=Pa039
01247 #endif
01248 /***************************************************************************/
01268 void USBH_PrintString( const char *pre,
01269                        const USB_StringDescriptor_TypeDef *s,
01270                        const char *post )
01271 {
01272   char *c;
01273 
01274   if ( pre )
01275   {
01276     USB_PUTS( pre );
01277   }
01278 
01279   if ( s )
01280   {
01281     c = (char*)&s->name;
01282     while ( *c )
01283     {
01284       USB_PUTCHAR( *c );
01285       c += 2;
01286     }
01287   }
01288 
01289   if ( post )
01290   {
01291     USB_PUTS( post );
01292   }
01293 }
01294 #if defined( __ICCARM__ )
01295 #pragma diag_default=Pa039
01296 #endif
01297 
01298  /*
01299   * A request for a configuration descriptor returns the configuration
01300   * descriptor, all interface descriptors, and endpoint descriptors for all
01301   * of the interfaces in a single request.
01302   * The first interface descriptor follows the configuration descriptor.
01303   * The endpoint descriptors for the first interface follow the first interface
01304   * descriptor.
01305   * If there are additional interfaces, their interface descriptor and endpoint
01306   * descriptors follow the first interface's endpoint descriptors.
01307   * Class-specific and/or vendor-specific descriptors follow the standard
01308   * descriptors they extend or modify.
01309   */
01310 
01311 /***************************************************************************/
01331 USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef *USBH_QGetConfigurationDescriptor(
01332                                     const uint8_t *buf, int configIndex )
01333 {
01334   int i;
01335   const uint8_t *start, *end;
01336   USB_DeviceDescriptor_TypeDef *dev;
01337 
01338   dev = USBH_QGetDeviceDescriptor( buf );
01339   if ( dev )
01340   {
01341     if ( configIndex < dev->bNumConfigurations )
01342     {
01343       /* Start of first configuration descriptor */
01344       start = buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef );
01345 
01346       /* Find end of avaiable data, NOTE: ep contains end of buf ! */
01347       end = EFM32_MIN(
01348           start + ((USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef*)start)->wTotalLength,
01349           (uint8_t*)(((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->ep));
01350 
01351       /* Scan through, looking for correct configuration descriptor */
01352       i = 0;
01353       while ( start < end )
01354       {
01355         if ( *start == 0 )
01356           return NULL;
01357 
01358         if ( ( *start     == USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE   ) &&
01359              ( *(start+1) == USB_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR )    )
01360         {
01361           if ( i == configIndex )
01362           {
01363             return (USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef*)start;
01364           }
01365         i++;
01366         }
01367 
01368         start += *start;
01369       }
01370     }
01371   }
01372   return NULL;
01373 }
01374 
01375 /***************************************************************************/
01387 USB_DeviceDescriptor_TypeDef *USBH_QGetDeviceDescriptor( const uint8_t *buf )
01388 {
01389   USB_DeviceDescriptor_TypeDef *dev = &((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->devDesc;
01390 
01391   if ( buf == NULL )
01392   {
01393     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_QGetDeviceDescriptor(), buf NULL pointer" );
01394     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01395     return NULL;
01396   }
01397 
01398   if ( ( dev->bLength         == USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE   ) &&
01399        ( dev->bDescriptorType == USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR )    )
01400   {
01401     return dev;
01402   }
01403   return NULL;
01404 }
01405 
01406 /***************************************************************************/
01434 USB_EndpointDescriptor_TypeDef *USBH_QGetEndpointDescriptor(
01435     const uint8_t *buf, int configIndex, int interfaceIndex, int endpointIndex )
01436 {
01437   int i;
01438   uint8_t *start, *end;
01439   USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef *itf;
01440 
01441   itf = USBH_QGetInterfaceDescriptor( buf, configIndex, interfaceIndex );
01442   if ( itf )
01443   {
01444     if ( endpointIndex < itf->bNumEndpoints )
01445     {
01446       /* First possible endpoint descriptor */
01447       start = (uint8_t*)itf + USB_INTERFACE_DESCSIZE;
01448 
01449       /* Search until start of next interface decsriptor, or to end of buf */
01450       end = (uint8_t*)USBH_QGetInterfaceDescriptor(
01451                                         buf, configIndex, interfaceIndex + 1 );
01452       if ( end == NULL )
01453       {
01454         /* NOTE: ep contains end of buf ! */
01455         end = (uint8_t*)((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->ep;
01456       }
01457 
01458       /* Scan through, looking for correct endpoint descriptor */
01459       i = 0;
01460       while ( start < end )
01461       {
01462         if ( *start == 0 )
01463           return NULL;
01464 
01465         if ( ( *start     == USB_ENDPOINT_DESCSIZE   ) &&
01466              ( *(start+1) == USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR )    )
01467         {
01468           if ( i == endpointIndex )
01469           {
01470             return (USB_EndpointDescriptor_TypeDef*)start;
01471           }
01472         i++;
01473         }
01474 
01475         start += *start;
01476       }
01477     }
01478   }
01479   return NULL;
01480 }
01481 
01482 /***************************************************************************/
01506 USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef *USBH_QGetInterfaceDescriptor(
01507                       const uint8_t *buf, int configIndex, int interfaceIndex )
01508 {
01509   int i;
01510   uint8_t *start, *end;
01511   USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef *conf;
01512 
01513   conf = USBH_QGetConfigurationDescriptor( buf, configIndex );
01514   if ( conf )
01515   {
01516     if ( interfaceIndex < conf->bNumInterfaces )
01517     {
01518       /* First interface descriptor */
01519       start = (uint8_t*)conf + USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE;
01520 
01521       /* Search until start of next config decsriptor, or to end of buf */
01522       end = (uint8_t*)USBH_QGetConfigurationDescriptor( buf, configIndex + 1 );
01523       if ( end == NULL )
01524       {
01525         /* NOTE: ep contains end of buf ! */
01526         end = (uint8_t*)((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->ep;
01527       }
01528 
01529       /* Scan through, looking for correct interface descriptor */
01530       i = 0;
01531       while ( start < end )
01532       {
01533         if ( *start == 0 )
01534           return NULL;
01535 
01536         if ( ( *start     == USB_INTERFACE_DESCSIZE   ) &&
01537              ( *(start+1) == USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR )    )
01538         {
01539           if ( ( i == interfaceIndex ) &&
01540                ( i ==
01541                  ((USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef*)start)->bInterfaceNumber ) )
01542           {
01543             return (USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef*)start;
01544           }
01545         i++;
01546         }
01547 
01548         start += *start;
01549       }
01550     }
01551   }
01552   return NULL;
01553 }
01554 
01555 /***************************************************************************/
01582 int USBH_QueryDeviceB( uint8_t *buf, size_t bufsize, uint8_t deviceSpeed )
01583 {
01584   USBH_Device_TypeDef *device = (USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf;
01585 
01586   USBH_InitDeviceData( device, NULL, NULL, 0, deviceSpeed );
01587 
01588   device->speed = deviceSpeed;
01589   device->ep = (USBH_Ep_TypeDef*)(buf+bufsize);/* Save buffer end addr here ! */
01590 
01591   /* Get the first 8 bytes of the device desc to figure out device EP0 size */
01592   if ( 8 != USBH_GetDeviceDescriptorB( device,
01593                                        &device->devDesc,
01594                                        EFM32_MIN( 8U, bufsize ) ) )
01595   {
01596     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
01597   }
01598   device->ep0.packetSize = device->devDesc.bMaxPacketSize0;
01599 
01600   /* Get entire device descriptor */
01601   if ( USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE != USBH_GetDeviceDescriptorB(
01602                            device,
01603                            buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ),
01604                            EFM32_MIN( (size_t)USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE, bufsize ) ) )
01605   {
01606     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
01607   }
01608   memcpy( &device->devDesc,
01609           buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ), USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE );
01610 
01611   /* Get configuration descriptor. */
01612   if ( USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE != USBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB(
01613                            device,
01614                            buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ),
01615                            EFM32_MIN( (size_t)USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE,
01616                                       bufsize - (size_t)USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE ),
01617                            0 ) )
01618   {
01619     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
01620   }
01621   memcpy( &device->confDesc,
01622           buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ), USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE );
01623 
01624   /* Get complete configuration descriptor. NOTE: Descriptor data is    */
01625   /* appended at the end of the device data structure !                 */
01626   if ( ( USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE + USB_INTERFACE_DESCSIZE ) >
01627        USBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB(
01628                            device,
01629                            buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ),
01630                            EFM32_MIN( device->confDesc.wTotalLength,
01631                                       bufsize - sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef )),
01632                            0 ) )
01633   {
01634     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
01635   }
01636 
01637   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01638 }
01639 
01640 /***************************************************************************/
01672 int USBH_Read( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount, int timeout,
01673                USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback )
01674 {
01675   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc = &hcs[ ep->hcIn ];
01676 
01677   if ( ep == NULL )
01678   {
01679     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), ep NULL pointer" );
01680     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01681     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01682   }
01683 
01684   if ( !USBH_DeviceConnected() )
01685   {
01686     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), No device connected" );
01687     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01688   }
01689 
01690   if ( (   byteCount > MAX_XFER_LEN                           ) ||
01691        ( ( byteCount / ep->packetSize ) > MAX_PACKETS_PR_XFER )    )
01692   {
01693     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Illegal transfer size" );
01694     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01695     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01696   }
01697 
01698   if ( (uint32_t)data & 3 )
01699   {
01700     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Misaligned data buffer" );
01701     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01702     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01703   }
01704 
01705   INT_Disable();
01706   if ( ep->state != H_EP_IDLE )
01707   {
01708     INT_Enable();
01709     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Endpoint is busy" );
01710     return USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY;
01711   }
01712 
01713   if ( !ep->in )
01714   {
01715     INT_Enable();
01716     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Illegal EP direction" );
01717     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01718     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01719   }
01720 
01721   if ( !hc->idle )
01722   {
01723     INT_Enable();
01724     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Host channel is busy" );
01725     return USB_STATUS_HC_BUSY;
01726   }
01727 
01728   ep->xferCompleted  = false;
01729   ep->state          = H_EP_DATA_IN;
01730   ep->xferCompleteCb = callback;
01731   ep->buf            = data;
01732   ep->remaining      = byteCount;
01733   ep->xferred        = 0;
01734   ep->timeout        = timeout;
01735 
01736   hc->buf = data;
01737   hc->xferred = 0;
01738   hc->remaining = byteCount;
01739   hc->ep = ep;
01740 
01741   if ( ep->type == USB_EPTYPE_INTR )
01742   {
01743     if ( timeout )
01744       timeout = EFM32_MIN( timeout, ep->epDesc.bInterval );
01745     else
01746       timeout = ep->epDesc.bInterval;
01747   }
01748 
01749   if ( timeout )
01750   {
01751     USBTIMER_Start( ep->hcIn + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
01752                     timeout, hcTimeoutFunc[ ep->hcIn ] );
01753   }
01754 
01755   USBHHAL_HCInit( ep->hcIn );
01756   USBHHAL_HCStart( ep->hcIn );
01757 
01758   INT_Enable();
01759 
01760   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01761 }
01762 
01763 /***************************************************************************/
01794 int USBH_ReadB( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount, int timeout )
01795 {
01796   int retVal;
01797 
01798   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
01799   {
01800     INT_Enable();
01801     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ReadB() called with int's disabled" );
01802     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01803     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01804   }
01805 
01806   retVal = USBH_Read( ep, data, byteCount, timeout, NULL );
01807   INT_Enable();
01808 
01809   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
01810   {
01811     while ( ! ep->xferCompleted );
01812 
01813     if ( ( retVal = ep->xferStatus ) == USB_STATUS_OK )
01814     {
01815       retVal = ep->xferred;
01816     }
01817   }
01818 
01819   return retVal;
01820 }
01821 
01822 /***************************************************************************/
01841 int USBH_SetAddressB( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device, uint8_t deviceAddress )
01842 {
01843   int retVal;
01844 
01845   if ( device == NULL )
01846   {
01847     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_SetAddressB(), device NULL pointer" );
01848     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01849     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01850   }
01851 
01852   if ( deviceAddress > USB_MAX_DEVICE_ADDRESS )
01853   {
01854     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_SetAddressB(), Illegal device address" );
01855     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01856     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01857   }
01858 
01859   retVal = USBH_ControlMsgB(
01860                     &device->ep0,
01861                     USB_SETUP_DIR_H2D | USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE |
01862                     USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK,         /* bmRequestType */
01863                     SET_ADDRESS,                          /* bRequest      */
01864                     deviceAddress,                        /* wValue        */
01865                     0,                                    /* wIndex        */
01866                     0,                                    /* wLength       */
01867                     NULL,                                 /* void* data    */
01868                     DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT );               /* int timeout   */
01869 
01870   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
01871   {
01872     device->addr = deviceAddress;
01873   }
01874   return retVal;
01875 }

01877 /***************************************************************************/
01897 int USBH_SetAltInterfaceB( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device,
01898                            uint8_t interfaceIndex, uint8_t alternateSetting )
01899 {
01900   int i, retVal;
01901 
01902   if ( device == NULL )
01903   {
01904     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_SetAltInterfaceB(), device NULL pointer" );
01905     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01906     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01907   }
01908 
01909   retVal = USBH_ControlMsgB(
01910                     &device->ep0,
01911                     USB_SETUP_DIR_H2D | USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_INTERFACE |
01912                     USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK,         /* bmRequestType */
01913                     SET_INTERFACE,                        /* bRequest      */
01914                     alternateSetting,                     /* wValue        */
01915                     interfaceIndex,                       /* wIndex        */
01916                     0,                                    /* wLength       */
01917                     NULL,                                 /* void* data    */
01918                     DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT );               /* int timeout   */
01919 
01920   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
01921   {
01922     // Alternate settings are mutually exclusive within the interface
01923 
01924     // We should:
01925     // Deactivate ep's in previous alternate interface setting
01926     // Activate ep's in the new alternate setting of the interface
01927 
01928     for ( i=0; i<device->numEp; i++ )           /* Reset all data toggles */
01929     {
01930       device->ep[i].toggle = USB_PID_DATA0;
01931     }
01932   }
01933 
01934   return retVal;
01935 }

02029 /***************************************************************************/
02036 void USBH_Stop( void )
02037 {
02038   int i;
02039 
02040   USBTIMER_Stop( HOSTPORT_TIMER_INDEX );
02041   for ( i = 0; i < NUM_HC_USED + 2; i++ )
02042   {
02043     USBTIMER_Stop( i + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX );
02044   }
02045   INT_Disable();
02046   USBHAL_DisableGlobalInt();
02047   INT_Enable();
02048   USBH_PortVbusOn( false );
02049   USBHAL_DisablePhyPins();
02050   /* Turn off USB clocks. */
02051   CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 &= ~(CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USB | CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USBC);
02052 }

02099 static void InitUsb( void )
02100 {
02101   int i;
02102 
02103   memset( hcs, 0, sizeof( hcs ) );
02104   for ( i = 0; i < NUM_HC_USED + 2; i++ )
02105   {
02106     hcs[ i ].idle = true;
02107   }
02108 
02109   INT_Disable();
02110   USBHHAL_CoreInit( USBH_initData.rxFifoSize, USBH_initData.nptxFifoSize,
02111                     USBH_initData.ptxFifoSize );
02112 
02113   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
02114   INT_Enable();
02115 }
02116 
02119 /***************************************************************************/
02146 int USBH_WaitForDeviceConnectionB( uint8_t *buf, int timeoutInSeconds )
02147 {
02148   bool xferError;
02149   USBH_Device_TypeDef *device;
02150   int accumulatedTime, deadLine;
02151 
02152   if ( buf == NULL )
02153   {
02154     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_WaitForDeviceConnectionB(),"
02155                         " buf NULL pointer" );
02156     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02157     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02158   }
02159 
02160   xferError = false;
02161   accumulatedTime = 0;
02162   USBH_attachRetryCount = 0;
02163   deadLine = timeoutInSeconds * 1000;
02164   device = (USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf;
02165 
02166   while ( 1 )
02167   {
02168     /* If USB is enabled, turn it off. */
02169     if ( USBHHAL_InitializedAndPowered() )
02170     {
02171       USBH_PortVbusOn( false );
02172       if ( deadLine )
02173         accumulatedTime += PORT_VBUS_DELAY;
02174     }
02175 
02176     /* Reset and init USB core. */
02177     InitUsb();
02178     if ( deadLine )
02179       accumulatedTime += 50;
02180 
02181     /* Turn on VBUS. */
02182     USBH_PortVbusOn( true );
02183     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '1' );
02184     if ( deadLine )
02185       accumulatedTime += PORT_VBUS_DELAY;
02186 
02187     /* Enable interrupts from USB core. */
02188     INT_Disable();
02189     USBHHAL_EnableInts();
02190     USBHAL_EnableGlobalInt();
02191     INT_Enable();
02192 
02193     /* Wait for device connection. */
02194     while ( 1 )
02195     {
02196       if ( USBH_DeviceConnected() )
02197         break;
02198 
02199       if ( ( deadLine                    ) &&
02200            ( accumulatedTime >= deadLine )    )
02201       {
02202         return USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT;
02203       }
02204 
02205 #if ( USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT != USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT_NONE )
02206       if ( GPIO_PinInGet( USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT, USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PIN ) ==
02207            USB_VBUSOVRCUR_POLARITY )
02208       {
02209         DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '~' );
02210         USBHHAL_PortReset( false );
02211         USBHHAL_VbusOn( false );
02212         USBTIMER_Stop( HOSTPORT_TIMER_INDEX );
02213         USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_OVERCURRENT;
02214         return USB_STATUS_PORT_OVERCURRENT;
02215       }
02216 #endif
02217       USBTIMER_DelayMs( 50 );
02218       if ( deadLine )
02219         accumulatedTime += 50;
02220     }
02221 
02222     /* Reset recovery time. */
02223     USBTIMER_DelayMs( 10 );
02224     if ( deadLine )
02225       accumulatedTime += 10;
02226 
02227     /* Do one USB transfer to check if device connection is OK. */
02228 
02229     USBH_InitDeviceData( device, NULL, NULL, 0, USBH_GetPortSpeed() );
02230 
02231     /* Get the first 8 bytes of the device descriptor */
02232     if ( 8 == USBH_GetDeviceDescriptorB( device, &device->devDesc, 8  ) )
02233     {
02234       return USB_STATUS_OK;
02235     }
02236     else
02237     {
02238       xferError = true;
02239       if ( deadLine )
02240         accumulatedTime += DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT;
02241     }
02242 
02243     /* Disable USB, power down VBUS. */
02244     USBH_Stop();
02245     /* Enable USB clocks again, USBH_Stop() turns them off. */
02246     CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 |= CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USB | CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USBC;
02247 
02248     if ( deadLine )
02249       accumulatedTime += PORT_VBUS_DELAY;
02250 
02251     if ( ( deadLine                    ) &&
02252          ( accumulatedTime >= deadLine )    )
02253       break;
02254 
02255     USBH_attachRetryCount = ( USBH_attachRetryCount + 1 ) %
02256                             ( sizeof( USBH_attachTiming ) /
02257                               sizeof( USBH_AttachTiming_TypeDef ) );
02258   }
02259 
02260   if ( xferError )
02261     return USB_STATUS_DEVICE_MALFUNCTION;
02262 
02263   return USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT;
02264 }
02265 
02266 /***************************************************************************/
02296 int USBH_Write( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount,
02297                 int timeout, USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback )
02298 {
02299   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc = &hcs[ ep->hcOut ];
02300 
02301   if ( ep == NULL )
02302   {
02303     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), ep NULL pointer" );
02304     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02305     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02306   }
02307 
02308   if ( !USBH_DeviceConnected() )
02309   {
02310     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), No device connected" );
02311     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02312   }
02313 
02314   if ( (   byteCount > MAX_XFER_LEN                           ) ||
02315        ( ( byteCount / ep->packetSize ) > MAX_PACKETS_PR_XFER )    )
02316   {
02317     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Illegal transfer size" );
02318     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02319     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02320   }
02321 
02322   if ( (uint32_t)data & 3 )
02323   {
02324     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Misaligned data buffer" );
02325     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02326     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02327   }
02328 
02329   INT_Disable();
02330   if ( ep->state != H_EP_IDLE )
02331   {
02332     INT_Enable();
02333     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Endpoint is busy" );
02334     return USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY;
02335   }
02336 
02337   if ( ep->in )
02338   {
02339     INT_Enable();
02340     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Illegal EP direction" );
02341     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02342     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02343   }
02344 
02345   if ( !hc->idle )
02346   {
02347     INT_Enable();
02348     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Host channel is busy" );
02349     return USB_STATUS_HC_BUSY;
02350   }
02351 
02352   ep->xferCompleted  = false;
02353   ep->state          = H_EP_DATA_OUT;
02354   ep->xferCompleteCb = callback;
02355   ep->buf            = data;
02356   ep->remaining      = byteCount;
02357   ep->xferred        = 0;
02358   ep->timeout        = timeout;
02359 
02360   hc->buf = data;
02361   hc->xferred = 0;
02362   hc->remaining = byteCount;
02363   hc->ep = ep;
02364 
02365   if ( ep->type == USB_EPTYPE_INTR )
02366   {
02367     if ( timeout )
02368       timeout = EFM32_MIN( timeout, ep->epDesc.bInterval );
02369     else
02370       timeout = ep->epDesc.bInterval;
02371   }
02372 
02373   if ( timeout )
02374   {
02375     USBTIMER_Start( ep->hcOut + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
02376                     timeout, hcTimeoutFunc[ ep->hcOut ] );
02377   }
02378 
02379   USBHHAL_HCInit( ep->hcOut );
02380   USBHHAL_HCStart( ep->hcOut );
02381 
02382   INT_Enable();
02383 
02384   return USB_STATUS_OK;
02385 }
02386 
02387 /***************************************************************************/
02416 int USBH_WriteB( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount, int timeout )
02417 {
02418   int retVal;
02419 
02420   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
02421   {
02422     INT_Enable();
02423     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_WriteB() called with int's disabled" );
02424     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02425     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02426   }
02427 
02428   retVal = USBH_Write( ep, data, byteCount, timeout, NULL );
02429   INT_Enable();
02430 
02431   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
02432   {
02433     while ( ! ep->xferCompleted );
02434 
02435     if ( ( retVal = ep->xferStatus ) == USB_STATUS_OK )
02436     {
02437       retVal = ep->xferred;
02438     }
02439   }
02440 
02441   return retVal;
02442 }
